Title: Beetle in a Haystack
Description:
There are still feral stagshells on the outskirts of Rak-Ush.

This scent grenade should be sufficient in stunning the beasts and alerting the niffen to their location.

Once they are stunned, one of the rats will take them back to their hollow.

Capture them and bring them back. We will be waiting.
ObjectivesText: Capture and return six Feral Stagshells to Rak-Ush.
